documentation.title: Uppercase Magic Constants
documentation.standard: The PHP native `__...__` magic constant should be in uppercase.
documentation.code_comparison: <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) echo __LINE__; include __DIR__ . '/file.php'; <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) echo __NameSpace__; include dirname(__file__) . '/file.php';
